author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
No commands, no world editors, no nether travel, no cheats. Just straight up walk all the way to the farlands in survival mode.

Walking about 35,000 blocks/day would take roughly 1 year to complete the journey (assuming it's done every day). 10,000 blocks/day (which isn't that difficult) would take almost 3 and a half years.

Should I do it?
body_html:
No commands, no world editors, no nether travel, no cheats. Just straight up walk all the way to the farlands in survival mode.

Walking about 35,000 blocks/day would take roughly 1 year to complete the journey (assuming it's done every day). 10,000 blocks/day (which isn't that difficult) would take almost 3 and a half years.

Should I do it?

body: No, there are already youtubers that do it. A waste of time, in my opinion. Build a giant glass fox in minecraft or something else cool.
